text:
FYI 
Click here to view this email in your web browser
 

 
 
Hello Henry, 
A critical vulnerability in Citrix NetScaler Application Delivery Controller
(ADC) and NetScaler Gateway, CitrixBleed (CVE-2023-4966)
,
has been exploited in the wild by multiple threat actors, including LockBit and
Medusa ransomware affiliates. CitrixBleed is extremely simple to exploit,
allowing unauthenticated, remote attackers to obtain valid session tokens and
bypass authentication. 
CISA has issued guidance

for addressing CitrixBleed, and we believe that immediate remediation

is of paramount importance to all affected organizations. Additionally, once
available patches have been applied, you will need to run commands

to kill active and persistent sessions to ensure attackers cannot replay any
valid stolen session tokens. 
To help you in your efforts, Tenable has released vulnerability detections

to find vulnerable systems and updated the Tenable Research Advisories: Urgent
Action dashboard

to help you respond faster. We strongly recommend that you use these plugins to
scan for any assets running Citrix NetScaler ADC and Gateway and patch
vulnerable assets as soon as possible. 
RR-MOVEit-1.png
[https://info.tenable.com/rs/934-XQB-568/images/Bp5Ou0COjq1rMB9j54CkcmNvfBM1eCpUZcHnzpGXGB_fHxkLPCJqWI1KdBNBHZsw7-B1532sqT-QFaA5HQ7c2img1ZspYX5Mclev7UoB_5iD4kxKLWCrd6e1sHW5.png?version=0]
 
We have also published a FAQ

to provide you with valuable information on CitrixBleed, the available patches
to address this vulnerability and the latest threat actor exploit activity. 
Please reach out to your Tenable Customer Success representative if you have any
questions. 
Regards,
Team Tenable 
Facebook 
 
Twitter 
 
LinkedIn 
 
YouTube 
 
Blog 
 
6100 Merriweather Drive, 12th Floor, Columbia, MD 21044. :copyright:2023 Tenable. All
rights reserved. All trademarks are the property of their respective owners.
Visit our Legal Notices and Privacy Policy for more information. You received
this because you indicated interest in Tenable services. Click here

to unsubscribe. 
https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgo.tenable.com%2FOTM0LVhRQi01NjgAAAGPlrwTg0PuWiLpjpPapML5xxS7MahxKYI1ciW7fl8WDj2CHOzI0GAGJKSkOnoEkb9kLOU6vlk%3D&data=05%7C01%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C56db6730e6894077574c08dbeb7785da%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638362670810107683%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=CzbKnGssIQwduXNhYYNO0tq14epCR%2Fa8dYKtuwwN%2FEM%3D&reserved=0[https://go.tenable.com/trk?t=1&mid=OTM0LVhRQi01NjgAAAGPlrwTg7clTQ8_fb65xsdc1PHGHcS8GyjvFUNHRRUkcGw_MG_ZTbpC-YLond503j3u7OiHrzYpPHuGE8mfVsU_b9vHi8Um3KHaxyZ4sFtv2BVlmhIHNtJhyXVVLHI_SuNXBkuv0SfF8P15zg] 
--
%3DxvF%3DWv0nN9YLx7KS5Pg%40mail.gmail.com

[https://info.tenable.com/rs/934-XQB-568/images/Cybersecurity+Advisory.jpg] 
Hello Henry, 
A critical vulnerability in Citrix NetScaler Application Delivery Controller
(ADC) and NetScaler Gateway, CitrixBleed (CVE-2023-4966)
[https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgo.tenable.com%2FOTM0LVhRQi01NjgAAAGPlrwTg5Ejn80bWefu32AL_e_Ze3jwnB5n-whb-rVXNkefT_vNiEVBeQbX7_HIwk3wsvowC-Y%3D&data=05%7C01%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C56db6730e6894077574c08dbeb7785da%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638362670809951456%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=4y7VlgjsEy%2B6FO3m%2B4%2BJkhwPpvWzAkhFn9XK8cmYXdM%3D&reserved=0],
has been exploited in the wild by multiple threat actors, including LockBit and
Medusa ransomware affiliates. CitrixBleed is extremely simple to exploit,
allowing unauthenticated, remote attackers to obtain valid session tokens and
bypass authentication. 
CISA has issued guidance
[https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgo.tenable.com%2FOTM0LVhRQi01NjgAAAGPlrwTgyIb2vJ54lA7P9UqoyZYgXN7WRkuHjsvUCyJwvMOJ54w5K_vxwduBn7FU1XrdT55ywA%3D&data=05%7C01%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C56db6730e6894077574c08dbeb7785da%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638362670809951456%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=osGaTEElNIuQP8k3LPfXjRzSGfClTObb97Nun7aTvLs%3D&reserved=0]
for addressing CitrixBleed, and we believe that immediate remediation
[https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgo.tenable.com%2FOTM0LVhRQi01NjgAAAGPlrwTg5Ejn80bWefu32AL_e_Ze3jwnB5n-whb-rVXNkefT_vNiEVBeQbX7_HIwk3wsvowC-Y%3D&data=05%7C01%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C56db6730e6894077574c08dbeb7785da%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638362670809951456%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=4y7VlgjsEy%2B6FO3m%2B4%2BJkhwPpvWzAkhFn9XK8cmYXdM%3D&reserved=0]
is of paramount importance to all affected organizations. Additionally, once
available patches have been applied, you will need to run commands
[https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgo.tenable.com%2FOTM0LVhRQi01NjgAAAGPlrwTg6RHBkwkmk4JF8pXqYppBDJJ53DPEeko9LT99Y4qQSiIAfcaGyyk006umej5YGw8rRk%3D&data=05%7C01%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C56db6730e6894077574c08dbeb7785da%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638362670809951456%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=i81jl7HUj1Pw%2FYoOMIhN%2BeY%2F0DJL0%2BB%2FHXMAp0Yse2Q%3D&reserved=0]
to kill active and persistent sessions to ensure attackers cannot replay any
valid stolen session tokens. 
To help you in your efforts, Tenable has released vulnerability detections
[https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgo.tenable.com%2FOTM0LVhRQi01NjgAAAGPlrwTg5Z7ZjzI_wMlTelq04UmZ158sgmw7lIHKF7td6d1XdX2YMWQwmeWABjNKcd6jrSJU04%3D&data=05%7C01%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C56db6730e6894077574c08dbeb7785da%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638362670809951456%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=kI5jw9%2Fxc%2FUtXBcSOx%2BrvkWvjiSpauSj9PmdPySL8NE%3D&reserved=0]
to find vulnerable systems and updated the Tenable Research Advisories: Urgent
Action dashboard
[https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgo.tenable.com%2FOTM0LVhRQi01NjgAAAGPlrwTg8RSU3MmObbwo4PCaVZctkQRM1QmyrI4H8Wwx-fAe30I4SaTBnz6SKj5_E5lyLfUDVc%3D&data=05%7C01%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C56db6730e6894077574c08dbeb7785da%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638362670809951456%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=wnIn%2BVqUllTtFW1%2Bt%2F1VS8QM5en5YSjiqPDdbOzHvxo%3D&reserved=0]
to help you respond faster. We strongly recommend that you use these plugins to
scan for any assets running Citrix NetScaler ADC and Gateway and patch
vulnerable assets as soon as possible.
